name: Racing Car Pursuit Pro
description:
Racing Car Pursuit Pro is a new endless racing game with realistic driving simulations and high graphics quality. Run away from Police with impressive racing cars and overtake the traffic from first person perspective! A whole city for you.
Beat your friend's high score with Gamecenter Leaderboard system and unlock new race cars with coins!

Racing Car Pursuit Pro will be updated constantly.

Features

- No Ads
- Double coins
- 3D realistic cockpit view
- 3D realistic environment
- High quality graphics with dynamic reflections
- Ultra realistic car physics
- Endless game mode
- Different vehicles to choose
- Awesome Race car driving experience
- Rich types of randomly generated NPC traffic including trucks and buses
- Realistic sounds
- Online Leaderboard

Tip

-Tilt your device to drag your car, to accelerate and brake touch the pedal buttons!

Racing Car Pursuit Pro is awesome driving simulation, download itand play with your friends!
